Bug report.Project name: Web-site of online Store Litecart, http://litecart.stqa.ru
Bug report.Summary: [Regional Settings] Pop up - no possibility to choose another language
Bug report.Steps to reproduce: Open main page. Click [Change] Button in Regional settings section in header. Select language from [Language] Listbox
Bug report.Actual result: No other languages can be selected from the [Language] Listbox
Bug report.Expected result: Other languages can be selected from the [Language] Listbox
